ManifestVersion.$comment: This field is only updated when a breaking changes to the manifest format are made and will be done with schema updates.
ManifestVersion.description: The version number of this manifest. **This is not the shaderpack version**, it is used for identifying compatibility with other tools.

ReShadeVersion.description: The major ReShade version that this shaderpack is built for.

Description.description: A short description describing this shaderpack.

Authors.description: The names of the authors that made the shaderpack.

LicenseFile.description: The path to the license that applies to this shaderpack.

WebsiteURL.description: A URL to the website of this shaderpack. This could be a git repository or landing page.

DonationURL.description: A URL to a website where someone can donate to this shaderpack.

Images.description: A collection of images that show off this shaderpack in action. Must be a https URL ending with .png or a .jpg.

Shaders.description: A declaration of every unique shader file included in this shaderpack.

Textures.description: A declaration of every unique texture file included in this shaderpack.

Presets.description: A declaration of every unique preset file included in this shaderpack.

Addons.description: A  declaration of every unqiue addon file included in this shaderpack.

Source.description: A source file name or path relative to the location of this manifest. Cannot start or end with a space.

Output.description: An output file name or path that will be appended after the relevant base output directory. Cannot start or end with a space.
